title: America's Army AA 2.8.4.0 CLIENT PATCH
description:
America&#039;s Army 2.8.4.0 patch installer 

from: http://aaotracker.com/thread.php?threadid=192159&sid=&threadview=0&hilight=&hilightuser=&page=8

reg fixes:
x86: http://aaotracker.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=16393
x64: http://aaotracker.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=16394

"Okay now I also can confirm this. Deploy Client asks me if I want to update AAO 2.8.4 to 2.8.4.0

The version number in registry needs to get changed (with regedit.exe or *.reg file) from 2.8.4 to 2.8.4.0 so that Deploy Client detects this version correctly ...

x86 Systems:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREUS ArmyAmerica&#039;s ArmyOperations

x64 Systems:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeUS ArmyAmerica&#039;s ArmyOperations

Version 2.8.4.0"
